title: Comedian Steve Byrne joins the DDFP!
itunes:title: Comedian Steve Byrne joins the DDFP!
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by comedian Steve Byrne! In this mostly game of life episode of the DDFP, the guys kibitzed about their love of Mario Lemieux (6:05), Shek's Wayne Gretzky run-in (23:00), advice for future comics (50:20), Steve's funny fight story in Phoenix (1:07:25) and a plethora of stories involving Bill Burr (34:30), Jimmy Kimmel (54:00), Jon Hamm (57:23) and Adam Carolla (1:02:00)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
